metadata.title: CVE-2023-52591 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:reiserfs: Avoid touching renamed directory if parent does not change TheVFS will not be locking moved directory if its parent does not change.Change reiserfs rename code to avoid touching renamed directory if itsparent does not change as without locking that can corrupt the filesystem.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-52591` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-41-generic - 6.5.0-41.41~22.04.2
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-41-generic - 6.5.0-41.41~22.04.2
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-41-generic-64k - 6.5.0-41.41~22.04.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1022-azure - 6.5.0-1022.23~22.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1022-gcp - 6.5.0-1022.24~22.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-41-lowlatency - 6.5.0-41.41.1~22.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-41-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-41.41.1~22.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1024-oem - 6.5.0-1024.25
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1015-starfive - 6.5.0-1015.16~22.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1024-oracle - 6.5.0-1024.24~22.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1024-oracle-64k - 6.5.0-1024.24~22.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1021-nvidia - 6.5.0-1021.22
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1021-nvidia-64k - 6.5.0-1021.22
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
linux-hwe-5.19: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-hwe-6.2').
linux-hwe-6.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-hwe-6.5').
linux-hwe-6.5 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-41.41~22.04.2').
